GPUShaderModule.summary: The GPUShaderModule interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} represents an internal shader module object, a container for WGSL shader code that can be submitted to the GPU for execution by a pipeline.

remarks.para: A GPUShaderModule object instance is created using .

GPUShaderModuleGetCompilationInfo.summary:
The getCompilationInfo() method of the
interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills with a object containing messages generated during the GPUShaderModule's compilation.
GPUShaderModuleGetCompilationInfo.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that fulfills with a object. contains a messages property, which is an array of objects, each one containing the details of an individual compilation message.

GPUShaderModuleLabel.summary:
The label property of the
interface provides a label that can be used to identify the object, for example in messages or console warnings.

remarks.para: This can be set by providing a label property in the descriptor object passed into the originating call, or you can get and set it directly on the GPUShaderModule object.

GPUShaderModuleLabel.value: A string. If this has not been previously set as described above, it will be an empty string.
